challenges.title: Autumn Adventure Photo Challenge
challenges.description:
Hello, Scavenger Hunt Teams!

To kick off our scavenger hunt, each team member will need to find and photograph a unique item that embodies the essence of fall. Once everyone has their photos, the team can work together to compile them into a collage representing your team's autumn adventure.
requirements: Ensure your team's name is included in your submission
To receive full points, your team's nominated captain must post the collage in the Microsoft Teams General channel

bonusPoints.description: Include a fun fall fact about one of the items in your collage
Create a unique caption (one per team member)

notes: I'll be sending out the link to the leaderboard later today so you can track your progress throughout the week!
